title: Evaluating the Capabilities of Generative AI Tools in Understanding Medical Papers: Qualitative Study
details: SH Akyon, FC Akyon, AS Camyar, F Hızlı, T Sari, Ş Hızlı - JMIR Medical Informatics, 2024
abstract: Background: Reading medical papers is a challenging and time-consuming task for doctors, especially when the papers are long and complex. A tool that can help doctors efficiently process and understand medical papers is needed. Objective: This …

title: Language Models and Retrieval Augmented Generation for Automated Structured Data Extraction from Diagnostic Reports

abstract: Purpose: To develop and evaluate an automated system for extracting structured clinical information from unstructured radiology and pathology reports using open- weights large language models (LMs) and retrieval augmented generation (RAG) …
